thread.title: They charge me for something I did not do
thread.title_full: They charge me for something I did not do - Review of Hotel Galileo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: hhijji_443209
title: They charge me for something I did not do
text: The hotel was nice, But when we arrive there was a lamp was a little bit broken. and the next day after they cleaned the room we could not find the lamp. and at the check out the charged me for the lamp and they accused me for doing which I did not
